title: Epstein wanted to impregnate 20 women at once to create 'super race' using his DNA
summary_full: Financier Jeffrey Epstein harbored plans for a genetically engineered 'super-race'. He discussed these transhumanist ideas with scientists and business figures. Epstein envisioned using his Zorro Ranch in New Mexico for his ambitious genetic experiments. These discussions reportedly began in the early 2000s. The New York Times reported little evidence of the scheme progressing beyond fantasy.
